index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>Syncfusion React Sample</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no" />
    <meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <meta name="description" content="Syncfusion React UI Components" />
    <meta name="author" content="Syncfusion" />
    <link href="https://cdn.syncfusion.com/ej2/28.1.33/{{theme}}.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
</head>

<body class="{{theme}}">
     <style>
            .control-section
            {
                margin-top: 100px;
            }
    </style>
    <div id='sample'>
</body>
</html>
index.js:
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'; import './index.css'; /** * Default sample for sparkline */ import * as React from "react"; import { SparklineComponent, Inject, SparklineTooltip } from '@syncfusion/ej2-react-charts'; import { SampleBase } from './sample-base'; const SAMPLE_CSS = ` .control-fluid { padding: 0px !important; }`; const titleStyle = { "width": "400px", "text-align": "center", "font-size": "17px", "margin": "auto" }; const width100 = { width: "100%" }; const sparklineStyle1 = { "width": "150px", "height": "50px", "text-align": "center" }; export class Default extends SampleBase { sparklineInstance; load(args) { let theme = location.hash.split('/')[1]; theme = theme ? theme : 'Fluent2'; args.sparkline.theme = (theme.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + theme.slice(1)).replace(/-dark/i, 'Dark').replace(/contrast/i, 'Contrast').replace(/-highContrast/i, 'HighContrast'); } render() { return (
